Name: Astro Bandits
About the game: 'Astro Bandits' is a classic 2D top-view arcade scrolling shooter. Nice graphics and atmospheric music will immerse you in the Aerospace Forces. Earth has been attacked by aliens. Only you, the captain of the Aerospace Forces, can save the planet from enemies. You have to protect the orbital station, as well as penetrate behind enemy lines and destroy all aliens. Collect new weapons, accumulate points and buy new ships for your hangar - this will help you to progress! Game Features: Nice visuals Cool OST Steam Achievements support Variety of weapons and upgrades Some levels are very difficult!
